verbose_text: The first gene, PDGFRB (MIM # 173410), produces a homodimeric tyrosine kinase (TK) receptor (PDGF-Rbeta) that can bind multiple ligands, including PDGF-B (platelet derived growth factor subunit B), which, along with the receptor, has been linked to PFBC in a number of recent studies 6, 9, 11, 16, 17, 18, 19.
